item.title: Map Reduce, i.e. using money and brain the right way
item.description: Have you been to a meeting where your key stakeholders, decision makers, or even your managers look at you like this? As a technical person, I have been to many of these, more than I had ever wanted to or wished for. It’s pretty much the reaction that me and my team would get when we try to push a new idea forward or even try something new. Adding that as a person coming from a third world country and being Asian, not getting a good scolding is already considered lucky (I did personally get those more than a fair share of it).
